resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104852</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104852</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204301</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Developing continuous air during articulation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sich entwickelnde ununterbrochene Luft während 
der Artikulation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Air continu se développant pendant 
l'articulation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ar contínuo tornando-se durante o articulation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aria continua di sviluppo durante l'articolazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανάπτυξη του συνεχούς αέρα κατά τη διάρκεια της 
άρθρωσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aire continuo que se convierte durante la 
articulación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Combining long tones and burst-tonguing will assist many beginning instrument players to eliminate excessive breaths while articulating.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Kombinieren der langen Töne und das 
bersten-Auflecken unterstützen viele anfangeninstrumentspieler, um 
übermäßigen Atem beim Artikulieren zu beseitigen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La combinaison de longues tonalités et 
éclater-les réprimander aideront beaucoup les joueurs commençants 
d'instrument pour éliminer les souffles excessifs tout en articulant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Combinar tons longos e estour-burst-tonguing 
ajudarão a muitos jogadores de começo do instrumento a eliminar 
respirações excessivas ao articular.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La combinazione dei toni lunghi e 
scoppi-burst-tonguing aiuteranno molti giocatori d'inizio dello 
strumento per eliminare gli aliti eccessivi mentre articolano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο συνδυασμός των μακροχρόνιων τόνων και έκρηξη- θα 
βοηθήσουν πολλούς αρχίζοντας φορείς οργάνων για να αποβάλουν τις
υπερβολικές αναπνοές αρθρώνοντας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Combinar tonos largos y el repartir-machihembrar 
asistirán a muchos los jugadores del instrumento que comienzan para 
eliminar las respiraciones excesivas mientras que articula.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:LYNN DALE
FN:LYNN DALE
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204301</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104852</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/developing-continuous-air-during-articulation</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
